system.description: Your patron conveys to you knowledge of both martial and arcane arts. Choose two 1st-degree combat maneuvers from any tradition. You learn these maneuvers. You can also use each of these maneuvers once without spending exertion, and you regain the use of each when you complete a long rest. (If the benefits of the maneuver improve based on the number of exertion spent, that value is 0.) You can change your choice of these maneuvers whenever you gain a warlock level.
